page.title: 12THE LOCAL WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: Luckington Women's Institute meets on the second Thursday on each month in the village hall. It is the only local club to meet in the village hall. The present membership numbers 24,mainly old age pensioners.The Thursday meeting is from 7.15 to 9.15 p.m.The committee consists of a Treasurer,Secretary and President; all these offices are held by locals from the village. Each month a different speaker is invited to the meeting. Member's subscription fees are Â£4 per annum.Members can join from the age of 16, sadly this local club does not attract youngsters, these generally travel outside the village for their entertainment.
